description: Variation of conditions 1, 3, 4 and 6 of listed building consent dated 20 June 2019 (RN: 19/01540) for the: External alterations including four dormers at roof level, installation of terrace at rear first floor level and balconies at second and third floor level. Installation of air condenser units within an acoustic enclosure at rear first floor flat roof area.  Associated internal alterations including rationalisation of internal plant area at fourth floor level. NAMELY, to amend the approved drawing numbers to allow re-configuration of the first-floor plant room and terrace arrangement; opening up the building from front to back by forming enlarged openings at first and second floor level; lowering the rear windows to make doors to the proposed terraces; changing to the riser locations; re-configuration the toilets and showers; basement works - relocating the bike store, adding door to vaults corridor, and into restaurant from vault corridor; provision of a small reception desk at ground floor level; and replacement of the balconies at rear second and third floor levels with Juliet balconies set within the window recess.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
LB Ext & Int works to match existing
